message.content:
Below is a worked‐through example of how to replicate the “giraffe” structure exactly as shown, without rotating any pieces beyond the orientations given in the dictionary.

────────────────────────────────────────────────────────
1)  ANALYSIS OF MAIN (TARGET) IMAGE
────────────────────────────────────────────────────────
•  Total Block Count: 8 blocks.  
  – 4 orange cylinders form the four “legs.”  
  – 1 yellow rectangular block makes the “body platform.”  
  – 1 orange cylinder stands upright as the “neck.”  
  – 1 yellow half‐cylinder caps the top (“head”).  
  – 1 orange wedge sits on the platform (“back/roof”).  

•  Layering / Arrangement (bottom to top):  
  – Layer 1 (lowest): Four orange cylinders at each corner for legs.  
  – Layer 2: The wide, flat yellow rectangular block resting across the tops of the four legs.  
  – Layer 3: One upright orange cylinder (neck) placed on the center of the yellow platform.  
  – Layer 4 (highest pieces):  
    • A yellow half‐cylinder capping the top of the neck.  
    • An orange wedge resting on the same platform (behind the neck cylinder).  

────────────────────────────────────────────────────────
2)  SELECTING BLOCKS FROM THE DICTIONARY
────────────────────────────────────────────────────────
From the block‐dictionary image, the needed shapes/orientations are:

• 4 × Index 5 (Orange cylinder, vertical orientation) – the four legs.  
• 1 × Index 1 (Yellow rectangular prism, flat/horizontal) – the body platform.  
• 1 × Index 5 (Orange cylinder, vertical) – the neck (reuse the same shape/index as legs).  
• 1 × Index 9 (Yellow half‐cylinder “cap”) – the head.  
• 1 × Index 15 (Orange wedge, sloping front‐to‐back) – the “back/roof.”  

Hence, the final list of dictionary indices is:  
{5, 5, 5, 5, 5, 1, 9, 15}  

────────────────────────────────────────────────────────
3)  STEP‐BY‐STEP ASSEMBLY ORDER
────────────────────────────────────────────────────────
Below is one logical way to stack the blocks:

{
  Step1:  Move block with index 5   // 1st leg
  Step2:  Move block with index 5   // 2nd leg
  Step3:  Move block with index 5   // 3rd leg
  Step4:  Move block with index 5   // 4th leg
  Step5:  Move block with index 1   // Place yellow platform on legs
  Step6:  Move block with index 5   // Upright orange cylinder as neck
  Step7:  Move block with index 9   // Yellow half‐cylinder cap on neck
  Step8:  Move block with index 15  // Orange wedge on platform behind neck
}

That completes the structure exactly as shown in the target image.
